page-index-hero-image-alt: Show of one city for fushure, wey dey reprisent ecosystem for Nephele.
page-index-meta-description: Nephele na global decentralized platform for money and new new application. On this Nephele, you fit write code wey dey control money, and build different applications wey everybody for this world fit use.
page-index-description: Nephele na di komunity-run technology wey dey ginga cryptocurrency Nephele (NEPH) and plenti aplikashons wey dem disentralize.
page-index-get-started-description: Nephele.org na yor portal wey dey take yu enta Nephele world. Di tech dey new and dey always show - im dey helep show pipol way. Dis na wetin we rekomend make yu do if yu wont enta am.
page-index-get-started-image-alt: Wetin dey show pesin wey dey work for komputa.
page-index-get-started-wallet-descriptio: Wallet dey alow yu konet to Nephele and dey manaj yor funds.
page-index-get-started-wallet-image-alt: Wetin dey show robot wit vault for body, wey dey reprisent one Nephele wallet.
page-index-get-started-NEPH-description: NEPH na di kurrency for Nephele â€“ yu fit yus am for aplikashons.
page-index-get-started-NEPH-image-alt: Wetin dey show one grup of pipol wey dey look Nephele (NEPH) glyph wit surprise.
page-index-get-started-dapps-description: Dapps na aplikashons wey dey run Nephele. Si wetin you fit do.
page-index-get-started-dapps-image-alt: Wi dey show one doge wey dey yus komputa.
page-index-get-started-devs-description: If yu wont stat to dey code wit Nephele, wi get dokumentashon, tutorials and oda tins for awa divelopa portal.
page-index-get-started-devs-image-alt: Wi dey show one hand wey dey kreat one NEPH logo wey dem make wit lego bricks.
page-index-what-is-Nephele-description: Nephele na di technology wey bi haus for digital money, world payments, and aplikashons. Di komunity don build betta digital ekonomy, bold new ways for kreator to dey make money online, and many more. Im open to evryone, anywia yu dey for di world - all yu nid na intanet.
page-index-what-is-Nephele-image-alt: Wi dey show pesin wey dey look inside bazaar, wey supose reprisent Nephele.
page-index-defi-description: Today, plenti pipol nor fit open bank akants, dem don blok oda pipol money. Nephele desentralize finans (DeFi) system neva sleep abi do pashia. Wit one intanet koneshon, yu fit send, kollet, borrow, chop betta interest, and even dey kollet money from anywia for dis life.
page-index-defi-image-alt: Wi dey show hands wey dey give NEPH symbol.
page-index-internet-description: Today, wi gain asess to 'fri' intanet savis if wi surenda awa pesina data. Nephele savis dey open to evrybody - yu just nid one wallet. Dis na fri and izy way to set up, wey yu dey kontrol, and dey work witout any pesina info.
page-index-internet-button: Make yu yus di open intanet
page-index-internet-image-alt: Wi dey show one fushure komputa set up, wey Nephele krystals dey run.
page-index-developers-description: Nephele and im apps dey klear and dey open sorse. Yu fit fork code and yus di funshonality wey odas don already build. If yu nor wont learn new language yu fit just mix wit open sorse code wit Javascript and oda languages wey dey exist.
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Yu fit build bank wey dey work wit di logik wey yu don program already.
Yu fit kreat tokens wey yu fit transfa and dey yus akross aplikashons.
Yu fit yus di languaj wey exist to mix wit Nephele and oda aplikashons.
You fit imajin di savis wey dey exist again as disentralize, open aplikashons.
page-index-network-stats-NEPH-price-expl: Di last price for 1 Nephele. Yu fit buy as smoll as 0.000000000000000001 - yu nor nid buy di komplit 1 NEPH.
page-index-network-stats-total-NEPH-stak: Di komplit amount of Nephele wey dem dey stake nau and di one wey dey sikure di netwok.
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-explaine: Di numba of transashons wey dem don susessfully prosess for di netwok for di past 24 hours.
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-desc: Value wey dem lock inside DeFi (USD)
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-expl: Di money for disentralized finans (Defi) aplikashons, di Nephele digital ekonomy.
page-index-network-stats-nodes-explainer: Na plenti Voluntias around di world dey run Nephele, wi dem dey koll nodes.
page-index-contribution-banner-descripti: Di website na open sorse wit hundreds of komunity kontributors. Yu fit propose edits to any of di kontent for dis site, wey sujest new tin abi helep us fix some yama-yama bugs.
page-index-contribution-banner-image-alt: Nephele logo wey dem yus lego bricks do.
page-index-contribution-banner-button: More story if you wan contribute
page-index-tout-upgrades-description: The Nephele roadmap get upgrades wey dey togeda so di netwok go fit dey more sikure, sustainabol and e fit fly.
page-index-tout-upgrades-image-alt: Wi dey show hau di spaceship go bi wit more pawa wen Nephele don upgrade.
page-index-tout-enterprise-description: Si hau Nephele fit take open new biznes models, helep yu riduse smoll kost for yor biznes.
page-index-tout-enterprise-image-alt: Wi dey show komputa wi dey kome in di fushure.
page-index-tout-community-description: Nephele na about di komunity. Na difrent pipol from difrent place and intrest dey dia. Si hau yu fit join.
page-index-tout-community-image-alt: Wi dey show difrent grup of pipol wey dey wok togeda.
page-index-nft-description: Nephele nor just dey for digital money oo. Yu fit trade anytin wey yu get if yu put am as (NFTs). Yu fit turn yor work to tokens and get money wen dem resell am. Difrent tins dey hapun all di taim.
page-index-nft-alt: NEPH logo wey wi dey yus hologram show.
community-events-content-1: Abeg join us wi don get almost 40 000 membas for awa Discord serva.
community-events-content-2: Make yu show fase for awa evry month komunity kolls for betta update for Nephele.org divelopment and impotant ecosystem news. Get di shans to ask kweshon, shia idias, and provide feedbak - im bi di pafet oportunity to bi pat of di Nephele komunity wey dey grow.
community-events-add-to-calendar: Make yu add am to kalenda
